description: A luxurious villa with stunning views of the Amalfi Coast.

description: A spacious villa with a pool and lake view in the beautiful town of Sirmione.

name: Villa Lecce

name: Villa Ostuni
description: A luxurious villa in Ostuni, the 'White City', with panoramic views and a large pool.

name: Villa Alberobello
description: A charming trullo villa in Alberobello, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, with modern amenities.

name: Villa Gallipoli
description: A stylish villa in Gallipoli, a historic seaside town, with a private pool and sea views.

name: Villa Sorrento
description: A luxurious villa in Sorrento, with breathtaking views of the Bay of Naples and a large private pool.

description: A stunning villa in Taormina, with panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea and a private infinity pool.

name: Villa Gallipoli
description: A stylish villa in Gallipoli, a historic seaside town, with a private pool and sea views.

name: Villa Ravello
description: A beautiful villa in Ravello, overlooking the Amalfi Coast and with a private pool and garden.

name: Villa Montepulciano
description: A Tuscan villa in Montepulciano, surrounded by vineyards and with a private pool and outdoor dining area.
